title: Volume 15, Number Eleven
summary: The newsletter discusses several legal updates including changes to the Public Works Act affecting labor and employment law, a PERC decision on minimum staffing in public agencies concluding that employers may not have met the burden of mandatory minimums, an Open-PAYGO law requiring electronic clearinghouses for payments between providers and municipalities, emergency services contract disputes over safety bills, a recall case involving local government officials, and public records laws protecting privacy.
